title: How to join a Teams meeting
content: So you have a client or external party that sent you a meeting but it’s being hosted on Teams? No worries, you can still attend this meeting without a license or signing into Microsoft. You will receive an email or web link invitation to join the Teams meeting from the external party . Click the link or paste it in your browser to access the meeting at the scheduled time. If you do not have a link to join the meeting, reach out to the customer or external party. If you are wanting to be the host, create the meeting over Zoom. Click Continue on this browser [Image] Accept the popup to ‘ Allow ’ or ‘ Always Allow’ MS teams to access your microphone and camera. If you do not see the popup, click on the little camera icon in the upper right hand corner of your browser bar [Image] Enter your name in the top bar to Join as a guest [Image] You may need to be accepted or approved by the host of the meeting [Image]
